0.3.1.name: wordpress/pictobrowser-gallery
0.3.1.description:
This plugin shows Picasa and Flickr web galleries in Wordpress using Pictobrowser. Only the album ID and its user ID are needed to show an album inside your Wordpress Blog.

How to retrieve the needed ids and insert an album??

Flickr:

  1. Visit an album on flickr you want publish in your blog, e.g. http://www.flickr.com/photos/rougerouge/sets/872426/
  2. you can retrieve username (rougerouge) and album id (872426) from this link, but you need to convert the username into a user id this is done by idgettr.com (in this case the user id is 90537551@N00)
  3. click on the icon, paste the ids and insert the gallery :)

Picasa:

  1. Visit an album on picasa you want publish in your blog, e.g. http://picasaweb.
